Name: Breakdown
About the game: This is a minimalistic arcade game where you control a bouncing ball. Your task is to punch the blocks down until there are no blocks left and the ball reaches the bottom. The difficulty lies in the spinning figures and black sectors on them. Hitting the ball on the black part of the figure will end your game and the level will start over. Good luck.
